title: Looking for buddies
body: I'm a uni student from HK and just created a new ac in OCE and looking for someone to have fun together. Skype would be nice for communication. Add me if interested :) ID : Marteemo

replies.body: added you mate always down to play games :D

uhhh

你好

对不起，我的中文不好

...
yeah... it's Cantonese over there not mandarin isn't it

Nah haha it's the other way round. What you type is mandarin, which is spoken by mainland Chinese, whereas Cantonese is spoken by people from Hong Kong, Macau, and a few cities in mainland like Shenzhen. 

Example for Cantonese:

你好
對唔住，我既中文唔好

It's similar in written but different in spoken

>yeah... it's Cantonese over there not mandarin isn't it

Let me rephrase that

Yeah... you speak Cantonese over there, not mandarin don't you.
